summary:
I am an Information Technology Leader with diverse experience in building and leading successful project management, software development and software implementation teams. I have a proven ability to recruit, train, coach and motivate team members to deliver successful IT projects. I partner effectively with all levels within my own organization and have been successful collaborating with all levels of clients and partner organizations.  In all of my roles I have worked to refine project management approach and methodology to deliver projects consistently and successfully.

Within the last six years I have provided Project Management oversight for:
•	Over 50 ERP Implementations
•	Over 100 Software Development Projects.
•	Two Product Development teams
•	Hundreds of custom modifications to ERP systems.
•	Implementations of CRM systems, Enterprise level integrations, custom software development projects for clients such as Boeing, Microsoft, Costco, Hexcel and the University of Washington.

company.name: Hitachi Solutions America, Ltd- Business Solution Group

profile_positions.description:
•	Provide Project Management and Engagement Management oversight for a portfolio of strategic accounts.
•	Responsible for coordination between North American Practice and Global Development Center in India.
•	Collaboration and communication between diverse global teams has been the focus my work to educate both regions to leverage the strengths of each geography. 
•	Audit quality and methodology compliance for projects using the GDC for development capacity.
•	This practice oversight includes professionals in D365 for Operations; D365 for Sales; Business Analytics & Collaboration and Managed Services.
•	Currently finishing a one year assignment to improve the business process maturity between the Global Development Center in India and the North American business units. From Hyderabad I have been able to view where the friction points are between the two cultures and study methods to both educate and adapt processes to bring processes into alignment.
•	Worked to fine tune the communication between professionals in both regions in order to reduce waste, maximize work effort, and ensure the highest quality deliverables.
profile_positions.title: Vice President

profile_positions.description:
•	Director of PMO – Responsible for client satisfaction through project oversight and methodology compliance.
•	Director of international Delivery - Responsible for International Deployments for mcaConnect clients and partner relationship management in all geographies. Development of global solution footprint methodology. Coordination of mcaConnect's Dynamics AX implementation team in Brazil. Actively managed projects based in the United States, Brazil, China, and Thailand. Presented AXUG; Doing Business in Brazil, and Best Practices for Global Implementations.
•	Director of Strategic Services
Responsible for delivery of portfolio of projects where mcaConnect partners with Microsoft Consulting Services.
Coordination of Lean Manufacturing Strategic Services teams
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Director of a software development team that provided comprehensive development support for an enterprise level CRM system. Managed multiple concurrent project for disparate business units.
Responsible for oversight of a team that supports call centers across the globe that support, Xbox, Windows, and Microsoft Store.
Participated in a Tiger Team whose role was to observe software issues in production, document, design, develop and pilot a prototype to resolve within a short duration of time.  
Team was focused on developing agile development processes and scenario focused engineering practices.
Provided oversight of global deployments, and provided onsite oversight of deployment of live chat capability in Cebu, Philippines.
profile_positions.title: Senior Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Led Dynamics AX Practice for Tectura in North America
Lead a group consisting of 50 Consultants, Developers, Project Managers and Presales Resources
Responsible for business planning, business management and responsibility for the North America AX Practice
Provided oversight to a team that successfully implemented and upgraded Dynamics AX systems, refined business processes, developed custom integrations and modifications to Dynamics AX for organizations around the world
Developed and implemented strategies to improve and sustain high levels of client satisfaction.
Responsible for forecasts, financial goals and measures such as operating income, A/R, services revenue, and services gross margin
Developed leaders within the organization, and worked to continue high rates of team member satisfaction and team member retention
Responsible for oversight of resource management. Team achieved consistently high levels of utilization
Coordination of global resources, utilizing consulting and development resources from Europe and India to support projects in North America
While in this role at Tectura, I first began working cross culturally when I Initiated a software development team in Noida, India to support the North American Practice. This was my first exposure to the complexity of working with a remote team. At that time I worked to develop successful delivery methodology to communicate effectively with resources in different geographies and learned to enjoy the challenges of collaborating globally
profile_positions.title: Practice Lead, Microsoft Dynamics AX Practice for North America

profile_positions.description:
•	Chosen by Vice President of North America Operations to solidify performance of the ERP team by introducing structured Project Management Methodology.
•	Expanded on the existing performance evaluation tool for team members and created professional development plans for all team members. 
•	Developed internal systems to improve team coordination capabilities creating efficiencies that further increased team’s ability to deliver solutions. 
•	Developed skills matrix and master resource schedule to remove bottlenecks from the staff resourcing process. 
•	Stabilized utilization and provided accurate planning and budgeting information. 
•	Wrote and reviewed statements of work, task orders, and negotiated subcontractor agreements with strategic partners. 
•	Served as Executive Sponsor for strategic projects on the West Coast.
•	Coordinated the efforts of a product development team.
•	Focused Project Management efforts on recovering troubled projects.
profile_positions.title: Group Lead, North American Dynamics AX Practice

profile_positions.description:
•	Led the integration of the PacWest ERP team with the Seattle-based Custom Development and Integration group.
•	Expanded development group by building development teams in Toronto, Los Angeles, and Delhi.
•	Focused Project Management efforts on recovering troubled projects.
•	Led a team of 30 team members comprised of software developers, project managers and business analysts. 
•	Grew capabilities of team through strategic hiring and building custom training programs to further develop internal resources.
•	Enforced methodology resulting in consistent team performance in delivering a large number of custom solutions.
•	Consistently delivered utilization and revenue performance above targets. Drove ongoing revenue streams from continued services and follow-on work with satisfied customers.
•	Coordinated the development efforts of international team of developers.
•	Served as Project Manager for selected key projects.
profile_positions.title: Group Lead, Software Development Team

profile_positions.description:
Software Development Manager 2000-2001
•	Managed a development team of cross-functional developers. 
•	Participated in corporate strategic planning, including major shifts in strategic direction.


Software Consultant 1999				 
•	Developed business to business integration tools for large enterprise insurance customers.
profile_positions.title: Development Manager
